#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
    while(1)
  {long long int a,b,c;
  cin>>a;
  cin>>b;
  cin>>c;
  if(a==0 && b==0 && c==0  )
    {
        break;
    }
    else{

    if(2*b==a+c)
    {
        cout<<"AP "<<c+b-a<<endl;


    }
    else
    cout<<"GP "<<(c*c)/b<<endl;

    }

  }

return 0;
}
